Description: The NoraSat Mission shall downlink at least 2.1 Tb of data per day
The NoraSat Mission shall downlink payload data with a Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR) of at least 26 dB
The NoraSat Mission shall utilize a circular orbit at an altitude of 600-700 km
The NoraSat Mission shall only utilize ground stations that are available to NASA
The NoraSat Mission shall begin operations on 1st Jan 2025
